mapper.select: select tt.name as tenantName , tt.id as tenantId, count(case when tewn.type=101 then tewn.type end ) hardwareWarnMsgCount, count(case when tewn.type=1 then tewn.type end ) systemWarnMsgCount from t_ele_warn_msg tewn left join t_tenant tt on tewn.tenant_id=tt.id group by tt.id limit #{query.offset}, #{query.size}
select count(1) from (select tenant_id from t_ele_warn_msg GROUP BY tenant_id) sub_ele_warn

select electricity_cabinet_id as electricityCabinetId, count(case when type=101 then type end ) hardwareWarnMsgCount, count(case when type=1 then type end ) systemWarnMsgCount from t_ele_warn_msg group by electricity_cabinet_id limit #{query.offset}, #{query.size}

select cell_no, count(case when type=101 then type end ) hardwareWarnMsgCount, count(case when type=1 then type end ) systemWarnMsgCount from t_ele_warn_msg where electricity_cabinet_id=#{query.electricityCabinetId} group by cell_no limit #{query.offset}, #{query.size}
select tec.name as electricityCabinetName,tt.name as tenantName from t_electricity_cabinet tec left join t_tenant tt on tec.tenant_id=tt.id where tec.id=#{electricityCabinetId}
select count(1) from (select electricity_cabinet_id from t_ele_warn_msg GROUP BY electricity_cabinet_id) sub_ele_warn;
